name: HealthCom Consulting
goal:
Founded in 2005, HealthCom Consulting is Public Relations and Public Affairs consultancy with a sound expertise in, and 100% devoted to healthcare.

Our wide network of relationships and collaborations with National and International scientific organizations and patient advocates, and our in-depth knowledge of the political, social and media environments, offer insightful research and effective strategic communications planning to our Clients: pharmaceutical, medical device, and biotech industry, dermocosmetic industry, medical and scientific associations, entrepreneurial and business organizations, advocacy and patients' associations.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Mainly Active ageing and public health related initiatives and policies
